newsitem.title: UK: Five Brent cargoes clocked, one kept - trade.
newsitem.headline: Five Brent cargoes clocked, one kept - trade.

text.p: Five of six Brent cargoes turning wet on Friday were unclaimed at the five o'clock deadline, trading sources said.
Two cargoes loading Sept 14-16 were clocked to British Petroleum (BP) and trader Arcadia, who then passed it late to Shell UK.
BP also kept a cargo loading Sept 15-17, while a second with the same dates was clocked to trader Cargill.
Elf and Arcadia were clocked with the remaining stems, due to load on Sept 16-18, trading sources said.
